BNF.Core.DecalSystem.DecalSymbolDef.label: Crimson Guard Engineer Regiment
BNF.Core.DecalSystem.DecalSymbolDef.description: The symbol of the Engineer Regiments of Vasilevsky, often seen repairing perimeter walls against the threat of the Omega Hive Fleet.
